data.title: Kevin Palmer
data.meta_description: Highly experienced tennis and football writer who has operated at the top of the sporting industry for the last 30 years. Worked for the Football Association, Wembley Stadium, the LTA, as well as ESPN and Yahoo Sports and Ireland's Sunday World and Irish Independent newspapers.
